# Sample Document for TUI Testing

This is a sample document used for integration testing of fabbro's TUI.

## Section One

This is the first section with some content.
It has multiple lines that can be selected.
Each line should be navigable with j/k keys.

## Section Two

Here is another section for testing.
We can add comments, questions, and other annotations.
The TUI should display line numbers correctly.

## Code Example

```go
func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, world!")
}
```

## Conclusion

This document has enough content for basic TUI testing.
